code: import _objectSpread from"/Users/rishabh/Desktop/AltCampus/Advanced React/Redux-Recat-Counter-App/counter-app/node_modules/@babel/runtime/helpers/esm/objectSpread2.js";import{createStore}from"redux";function reducer(){var state=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:{value:0,step:1,max:Infinity};var action=arguments.length>1?arguments[1]:undefined;switch(action.type){case"increment":return _objectSpread(_objectSpread({},state),{},{value:state.value+state.step});case"decrement":if(state.value>0){return _objectSpread(_objectSpread({},state),{},{value:state.value-state.step});}else{return _objectSpread(_objectSpread({},state),{},{value:0});}case"updateState":return _objectSpread(_objectSpread({},state),{},{step:action.payload});case"updateMax":return _objectSpread(_objectSpread({},state),{},{max:action.payload});case"reset":return _objectSpread(_objectSpread({},state),{},{value:0,step:1,max:Infinity});default:return state;}}var store=createStore(reducer);export default store;
